menu.title: Strained Pancake
menu.desc: The flavor of milk in buttermilk pancakes! Add flavor to your day with our soft, strained pancakes.

menu.title: Diner double burger
menu.desc: Our double hamburger, prepared diner style, is a perfect choice for your lunch with its delicious taste and satisfying content!

menu.title: Godzilla milkshake
menu.desc: A legendary taste awaits you! Pamper yourself with our Godzilla Milkshake and take a sweet break.

menu.title: Village taste
menu.desc: The indispensable taste of village breakfasts is now here! Prepared with completely natural ingredients, the Village Taste breakfast invites you to a delicious feast of flavors..

menu.title: Egg Attack
menu.desc: The indispensable taste of village breakfasts is now here! Prepared with completely natural ingredients, the Village Flavor breakfast invites you to a delicious feast of flavors..

menu.title: Oreo Dream
menu.desc: A great taste for Oreo lovers! Oreo Dream takes you to a sweet world. You can't get enough of its flavor!!

menu.title: Bacon Flood
menu.desc: A must for breakfast lovers! Bacon Flood, prepared with plenty of freshly fried bacon and other flavors, will give you a great start to the day.

menu.title: American Classic
menu.desc: This lunch, prepared with the classic flavors of American cuisine, offers an experience that you can't get enough of. Moreover, it is preferred because of its affordable price!

menu.title: Quarantine Buddy
menu.desc: A delicious milkshake that will not leave you alone when you are bored during quarantine days! Have a sweet escape with Quarantine Buddy.

menu.title: Buffalo Steak
menu.desc: The unique flavor of bison meat is combined with special spices and sauces. Bison Steak is a perfect choice for your dinner!
